sql.getFileInfoCount: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT path) total FROM default.o_com_mm_hdfs_file_info WHERE part_d = '$partD'
sql.getFileInfo: SELECT DISTINCT path path, replication_qty replicationCount, modification_time_dts modificationTime, access_time_dts accessTime, preferred_blocksize_qty preferredBlockSize, blocks_count_qty blocksCount, file_size_qty fileSize, ns_quota_qty nsQuota, ds_quota_qty dsQuota, permission permission, username userName, groupname groupName, part_d partD FROM meta_manager.hdfs_file_info WHERE part_d = '$partD' and `path` like "$prefixPath%" ORDER BY path LIMIT $limit OFFSET $offset
